title: Repetitive issue of dcing yet still being connected to internet
body: title, and i've checked the website but im not sure what is wrong

replies.body:
If your connection to League is **unstable**, there could be specific local network settings that are causing or exacerbating the issue. I'd strongly recommend going through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) so you can configure your local network settings so they're compatible with League.

Should you continue to disconnect after taking those steps, we can investigate further.
This seems to only be happening on one of my accounts too....
